user.title: Blinds configuration
user.description: Initial configuration for the blinds component

data.entity_up: Entity to control the up movement
data.entity_down: Entity to control the down movement
data.time_up: Time for the up movement in seconds
data.time_down: Time for the down movement in seconds
data.tilt_open: Time for tilt angle for the open state from closed state in seconds
data.tilt_closed: Time for tilt angle for the closed state from open state in seconds
data.time_to_roll_down: Set the time if you wish to roll the blinds down at a specific time (HH:MM)
data.time_to_roll_up: Set the time if you wish to roll the blinds up at a specific time (HH:MM)
data.delay_sunrise: Delay in minutes after sunrise to open the blinds.
data.delay_sunset: Delay in minutes after sunset to close the blinds
data.entity_night_lights: When it's nighttime and the entity is turned on, the blinds will roll down.
data.tilting_day: Tilt will remain open during the day
data.protect_the_blinds: Protect the blinds from the strong wind and rain
data.wind_speed: Wind speed in km/h (if current above blinds will close)
data.wmo_code: WMO code for the location (if current above blinds will close)
data.send_stop_at_end: Send stop command at the end (interlock relay)
